reference.title: TTBR1_EL2, Translation Table Base Register 1, EL2
reference.shortdesc: TTBR1_EL2 has the same format and contents as TTBR1_EL1.

section.p: See TTBR1_EL1, Translation Table Base Register 1, EL1The TTBR1_EL1 holds the base address of translation table 1, and information about the memory it occupies. This is one of the s for the stage 1 translation of memory accesses at EL0 and EL1..
